name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: Chasten and I are saddened by the news of Susan’s passing - and thankful for having known her wonderful presence and friendship. So many Hoosiers will miss her and will be holding the Bayh family in our thoughts and prayers.

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: Thanks, love.  https://t.co/0sEVSr5EqO

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: This is our moment to build back better.  Please follow me at @SecretaryPete and @USDOT for the latest updates on how we’re transforming our nation’s transportation future.

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: I'm honored and humbled by today's vote in the Senate—and ready to get to work @USDOT.

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: This #BlackHistoryMonth, America celebrates the profound ways in which Black Americans have built, shaped, and bettered this country. The lessons of Black history compel us all to work toward a more perfect and equitable union, every day.

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: Thank you to the members of the @SenateCommerce Committee for their vote of confidence in me today. I look forward to working with @SenatorWicker, @SenatorCantwell, and the rest of the committee as we get to work on infrastructure and building our economy back better.

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: I'll be on CNN tonight with @donlemon at 10:20pm ET. Hope you'll tune in.

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: One of the reasons I'm so excited to get to work at @USDOT is the opportunity before us to build infrastructure and create a transportation policy that will allow us to tackle the climate crisis.  https://t.co/hj4qKdIpMI

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: Any time we can make the federal government work better for state, local, territorial, and tribal parters we should.

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: I never miss a chance to talk about South Bend—or our smart streets initiative that helped bring new life, and opportunities, to our city.  https://t.co/TKP4AgGaqo

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: Having my husband @Chasten by my side yesterday in a hearing room is something not seen before for a Cabinet nominee. And our hope is that it makes it easier for the next person to come along.

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: We won't solve all of our problems overnight—but what changed this week is that we now have a president who can provide the leadership we need.  https://t.co/kCUHfCsdSX

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: Thank you to @SenToddYoung for your kind introduction today. Looking forward to continuing to work with you in the future as we have in the past—like during this visit to South Bend in 2019.  https://t.co/GHOLRNDwBt

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: We have a real chance to deliver for the American people—to build our economy back, better than ever, and the @USDOT can play a central role in this.  https://t.co/0RaNJb0fyB

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: @SenJohnThune Thank you, Senator - I'm looking forward to working together on this.

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: @SenatorFischer Thank you, Senator. Looking forward to all that we can accomplish together.

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: @amyklobuchar @Chasten Appreciate your support and warm welcome at the committee - and looking forward to working together!

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: I'm honored to appear before the @SenateCommerce Committee today as the nominee for Secretary of Transportation.   Please tune in at 10am ET:  https://t.co/WorDPvWwdV

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: A special sunrise this morning. How does it look where you are?

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: It's been an unforgettable and historic day. Congratulations to @POTUS and @VP!

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: I'll be on @Morning_Joe tomorrow at 7:15am ET. Hope you'll tune in!

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: And I’m pleased to join everyone in wishing a Happy Birthday to @DollyParton!

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: Thanks to everyone for the kind birthday wishes today! Very much looking forward to the year ahead and the new era that begins tomorrow.

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: As we honor the legacy of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. through service today—let's also commit to bending the moral arc of the universe toward justice, as he put it, in all our work ahead as we rebuild for a more just and equitable future. #MLKDay

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: We should all be proud that @PresElectBiden has nominated a cabinet that looks like America—the first ever that is evenly divided by gender and the first where the majority are people of color.

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: As @PresElectBiden has said, it's time to stop just talking about infrastructure and to actually start building an infrastructure.

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: On day one, the Biden administration will be ready to lead and tackle both the public health and economic crises head-on.   The American Rescue plan is the first step.  https://t.co/hH18zqr2Hw

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: Thrilled for my friend @harrisonjaime—and our party!

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: In one week we will have a president and vice president with integrity and decency, qualities we need more than ever.

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: It was great speaking, Senator. Appreciate your leadership and interest in ensuring we develop infrastructure that works for all in our home state and across the country.

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: Thank you, @SenDuckworth. I'm honored to have your support and looking forward to working together.

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: If confirmed, as Secretary, I will ensure that the Department of Transportation carries out its most fundamental mission of ensuring safety for both travelers and workers.

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: I'm hearing from a broad coalition of Americans—from every community and across political lines—who see enormous opportunities for job creation, equity, and climate achievement when it comes to advancing America's infrastructure.

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: Words have consequences, especially the words of a president and his allies. Today those consequences include violent rioters attacking our Capitol to overthrow the American democratic process. This must end, and democracy must prevail.

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: On January 20th, we will have a new president whose first instinct is to unite—not divide. That moment can't come soon enough.

name: Pete Buttigieg
tweet: Democracy defines the American project. We cannot let our nation's commitment to democratic values become a casualty of this chaotic and divisive era in our history.
